FIRST_OPEN.TextInfo: Drag blocks onto the board to place them.

FIRST_OPEN_2.TextInfo: Place blocks on the grid to make squares to get energy and points.

FIRST_BLOCK.TextInfo: Here is your energy. It will go up when you make squares and down when you don’t. If it hits zero, you lose.

FIRST_SQUARE.TextInfo: Making squares will earn you points and energy. Try to get a high score!

FIRST_WASTE.TextInfo: Extra blocks that are adjacent to squares become Waste. They drain 1 energy from you every move. Get rid of them by using them to make squares!

FIRST_WASTE_2.TextInfo: Waste that is adjacent to squares becomes more potent. Level 2 Waste drains 3 energy each move.

FIRST_WASTE_3.TextInfo: This Waste block has grown out of control! It will drain 5 energy from you each move, so clean it up quick!

FIRST_LOW_ENERGY.TextInfo: You’re running out of energy! Make a square this turn or you’ll lose!

FIRST_EVENT.TextInfo: At certain score thresholds Events will be triggered, that make the game harder. Each event continues until you earn a certain number of points.

FIRST_BREACH.TextInfo: Reactor Breach: A breach has occurred in the reactor and foreign material is taking up space.

FIRST_URANIUM.TextInfo: Unrefined Uranium: Some budget cuts mean you have to place some less than perfect blocks on the board.

FIRST_CONTAMINATION.TextInfo: Contamination: Your material has become contaminated and now blocks will spawn with wastes in them.

FIRST_MELTDOWN.TextInfo: Reactor Meltdown: The reactor is melting down! Be prepared for multiple events at once!

FIRST_OVERLOAD.TextInfo: Reactor Overload: The reactor has completely overloaded! All the events are occurring at once! This is your final challenge!
